data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the Malaysian Idiocerinae (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae), with description of new taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Qingquan, Mckamey, Stuart H., Zhang, Yalin (2017): Taxonomic revision of the Malaysian Idiocerinae (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae), with description of new taxa. Zootaxa 4226 (3): 405-428, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4226.3.5
